channel.title: Project Sony Version 2 [Download] all specs! Client download!
channel.description:
[img]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/637/serverstauts.gif[/img]
[size=24pt]Forums lniks are down so dont remove picture![/size]
Will put up client later!
Server download - http://uppit.com/v0ta1yhmnci5/Project_Sony_server.rar
Client download - http://uppit.com/eark5rp55kep/Project_Sony_Client.rar.rar
Note: i did not do much on this server its was mostly bugged up the login glitched i fixed and dark bow.. and some other stuff
Credits Demise me arrowsftw tuts
Welcome to project-sony version 2 the leastest pking server you can set your stats and you have 50m but not necessary shops dont take your cash WooP Pk drops some times you get the icons like runescape pvp we need donations for our VPS i have 10 pounds atm waiting for another 14 pounds so get donating Updates will be taking place so dont expect 100% uptime but if there is an update you will no by our update system as you may no project sony was created last year around 40+ players some of you may remember
Features
* Special attack (expect Dark bow) *Perfect combat *Combat following *Clickable stats (click the stat chose what level you want it) *Dragon arrows & bolts * High,Medium,low training zone for when beta is over *Pk points and a shop *yell ranks *Commands likes ::barrage or ::veng *Full G-Maul *Perfect maging *Couple of shops *Cache downloader (so client wont take long to download) *Lovely economy
Combat redone fair hits not too high not too low its depends on your bouns
Please read this the client comes with an auto-cache downloader so it will take around 15 mins to download depending on your connection 1-15 mins ..
Client version 2 now shows Dragon arrows!
